panels.visual: Visual: The Temple of Aspects rises magnificently - an ancient stone building with four towers, each glowing a different color: red, green, blue, and gold. Banners flutter in the breeze. The glowing figure approaches through a crowd of other young candidates. Location: Temple of Aspects courtyard Characters: Lightsword, other candidates (all glowing indeterminate figures), guards
panels.dialogue: (Caption): "The Temple of Aspects. Four towers. Four powers. One destiny."

characters.Lightsword: A GLOWING ETHEREAL FIGURE made entirely of soft golden-white light. NOT a lizard, NOT humanoid with defined features - pure luminous energy in vaguely humanoid shape. No visible face, just two bright points of warm light where eyes would be. The entire body GLOWS and PULSES with inner light. Wearing simple cream-colored ceremonial robes that the light shines through. Ethereal, mysterious, magical being of pure radiance.
